properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_EVENT_BOARD ( EVENT_NO, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, STATUS, MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_EVENT_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, ? )

INSERT INTO TB_EVENT_PHOTO ( EVENT_PHOTO_NO, EVENT_PHOTO_ONAME, EVENT_PHOTO_CNAME, EVENT_PHOTO_ADDRESS, EVENT_NO, STATUS, FILELEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_EVENT_PHOTO_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, SEQ_EVENT_BOARD_NO.CURRVAL, DEFAULT ? )
